ygData.subject: Re: Unintelegable scrolls? SPOILERS! BEWARE!
ygData.msgSnippet: As far as I know you cant ever decipher them ... * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * I know that you can turn them into Lord Jaylel in the Paladins guild of
ygData.messageBody:
As far as I know you cant ever decipher them
>SPOILER WARNING***************************
*
*
*
*
*
*
*
*
*
*
*
*
*
*
*
I know that you can turn them into Lord Jaylel in the Paladins guild of
Felwithe. It is a quest that he gives out to paladins, clerics and those in
good standing with the guild. If you don't have standing you can still give
the item to him, but don't expect much more than a faction raise in return
for it.
This can also be done with the Orc Runner pouches. Hope this helps some.

>I also have a question about unintelligible scrolls.
>
>When will I be able to use this? I think I need to speak the language of
>the creature I obtained it from (I got it from an Orc Oracle I slew in
>Crushbone) Will I also need the research skill.
>
>Assuming I need to learn Orcish, does anyone know where I can learn this
>foul language??
>

Garret E. Albritton (Defender)
Frontier of Reality Productions
